mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG(TYPE_, TASK_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_DEFINITION_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_, TIME_STAMP_, USER_ID_, DATA_) values ( #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG(TYPE_, TASK_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_DEFINITION_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_, TIME_STAMP_, USER_ID_, DATA_) values
(#{taskLog.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.processDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.timeStamp, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskLog.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.data, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG(ID_, TYPE_, TASK_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_DEFINITION_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_, TIME_STAMP_, USER_ID_, DATA_) values ( ${prefix}ACT_HI_TASK_EVT_LOG_SEQ.nextVal, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT ALL
into ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG(ID_, TYPE_, TASK_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_DEFINITION_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_, TIME_STAMP_, USER_ID_, DATA_) VALUES (${prefix}ACT_HI_TASK_EVT_LOG_SEQ.nextVal, #{taskLog.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.processDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.timeStamp, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskLog.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskLog.data, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.delete: delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG where SCOPE_DEFINITION_ID_ = #{scopeDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCOPE_TYPE_ = #{scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

delete TSKLOG from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG TSKLOG where TSKLOG.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and TSKLOG.PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and NOT EXISTS (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST where TSKLOG.PROC_INST_ID_ = PROCINST.ID_)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG TSKLOG where TSKLOG.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and NOT EXISTS (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST where TSKLOG.PROC_INST_ID_ = PROCINST.ID_)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG where PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and PROC_INST_ID_ NOT IN (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST)

delete TSKLOG from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG TSKLOG where TSKLOG.SCOPE_ID_ is not null and TSKLOG.SCOPE_ID_ != '' and TSKLOG.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and NOT EXISTS (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_RU_CASE_INST CASEINST where TSKLOG.SCOPE_ID_ = CASEINST.ID_)

delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG TSKLOG where TSKLOG.SCOPE_ID_ is not null and TSKLOG.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and NOT EXISTS (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_RU_CASE_INST CASEINST where TSKLOG.SCOPE_ID_ = CASEINST.ID_)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_TSK_LOG where SCOPE_ID_ is not null and SCOPE_ID_ != '' and SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and SCOPE_ID_ NOT IN (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_RU_CASE_INST CASEINST)
